main_definition: To direct a communication towards someone or to locate the position of something, often involving specific details such as name, location, and other identifying information.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To communicate with someone regarding an issue or concern
meanings_and_examples.example: I need to address your recent performance at work.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The location of a building, person, organization, etc.
meanings_and_examples.example: Please provide me the street address of the restaurant you visited last night.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To deal with or confront an issue
meanings_and_examples.example: She had to address the problem head-on and find a solution.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A formal letter, often used for legal or official purposes
meanings_and_examples.example: I received your address in person as part of my job application process.
